pp2.1:1.2: Idhekacco puggalo kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—
pp2.1:2.2: Idhekacco puggalo na heva kho kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—
pp2.1:3.2: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.
pp2.1:3.3: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:3.4: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
pp2.1:3.5: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ tassa puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyuṃ—
pp2.1:4.2: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.
pp2.1:4.3: So ca kho nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:4.5: Aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ tassa puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyuṃ—
pp2.1:5.2: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.
pp2.1:5.3: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:5.4: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
pp2.1:5.5: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so puggalo pamādamāgamma tāhi samāpattīhi parihāyeyya—
pp2.1:6.2: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.
pp2.1:6.3: So ca kho nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:6.5: Aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ so puggalo pamādamāgamma tāhi samāpattīhi parihāyeyya—
pp2.1:7.2: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.
pp2.1:7.3: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:7.4: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
pp2.1:7.5: Sace anusañceteti, na parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi.
pp2.1:7.6: Sace na anusañceteti, parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi—
pp2.1:8.2: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ.
pp2.1:8.3: So ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
pp2.1:8.4: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
pp2.1:8.5: Sace anurakkhati, na parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi.
pp2.1:8.6: Sace na anurakkhati, parihāyati tāhi samāpattīhi—
pp2.1:9.3: na ca tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya paṭipanno—
pp2.1:10.2: Yesaṃ dhammānaṃ samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti tehi dhammehi samannāgato—
pp2.1:11.2: Satta sekkhā bhayūparatā, ye ca puthujjanā sīlavanto.
pp2.1:12.2: Ye te puggalā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā, kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā, vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā, assaddhā acchandikā duppaññā eḷā, abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ—
pp2.1:13.2: Ye te puggalā na kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā, na kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā, na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā, saddhā chandikā paññavanto aneḷā, bhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ—
pp2.1:14.2: Pañca puggalā ānantarikā, ye ca micchādiṭṭhikā niyatā, aṭṭha ca ariyapuggalā niyatā.
pp2.1:15.2: Cattāro maggasamaṅgino puggalā paṭipannakā, cattāro phalasamaṅgino puggalā phale ṭhitā.
pp2.1:16.2: Yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca—
pp2.1:17.2: Ayañca puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno assa, kappassa ca uḍḍayhanavelā assa, neva tāva kappo uḍḍayheyya yāvāyaṃ puggalo na sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikaroti.
pp2.1:22.2: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhati;
pp2.1:22.3: tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti, balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ—
pp2.1:23.2: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhati;
pp2.1:23.3: na ca tattha sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti, na ca balesu vasībhāvaṃ—
pp2.1:24.2: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati;
pp2.1:24.3: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—
pp2.1:25.2: Idhekacco puggalo na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati;
pp2.1:25.3: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pp2.1:26.2: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati;
pp2.1:26.3: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pp2.1:27.2: Idhekacco puggalo “idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
pp2.1:27.3: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā.
pp2.1:27.4: Paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti—
pp2.1:28.2: Idhekacco puggalo “idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
pp2.1:28.3: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā.
pp2.1:28.4: Paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti, no ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassa—
pp2.1:29.2: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, paññāvāhiṃ paññāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti—
pp2.1:29.4: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dhammānusārī phale ṭhito diṭṭhippatto.
pp2.1:30.2: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, saddhāvāhiṃ saddhāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti—
pp2.1:30.4: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo saddhānusārī phale ṭhito saddhāvimutto.
pp2.1:31.2: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.
pp2.1:31.3: So sattakkhattuṃ deve ca mānuse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti—
pp2.1:32.2: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.
pp2.1:32.3: So dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti—
pp2.1:33.2: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.
pp2.1:33.3: So ekaṃyeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti—
pp2.1:34.2: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti—
pp2.1:35.2: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā—
pp2.1:36.2: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
pp2.1:36.3: So upapannaṃ vā samanantarā appattaṃ vā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—
pp2.1:37.2: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
pp2.1:37.3: So atikkamitvā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ upahacca vā kālakiriyaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—
pp2.1:38.2: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
pp2.1:38.3: So asaṅkhārena ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—
pp2.1:39.2: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
pp2.1:39.3: So sasaṅkhārena ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—
pp2.1:40.2: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
pp2.1:40.3: So avihā cuto atappaṃ gacchati, atappā cuto sudassaṃ gacchati, sudassā cuto sudassiṃ gacchati, sudassiyā cuto akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchati;
pp2.1:40.4: akaniṭṭhe ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya—
pp2.1:41.1: Katamo ca puggalo sotāpanno sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno?
pp2.1:41.2: Tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.
pp2.1:42.1: Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.
pp2.1:43.1: Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ anavasesappahānāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.
pp2.1:44.1: Rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjāya anavasesappahānāya paṭipanno puggalo arahattaphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno.
pp2.1:44.2: Yassa puggalassa rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ avijjā anavasesā pahīnā—
